channel.title: RunePkz - Oldschool PKing Server - Updated Daily - [RELEASED]
channel.description:
[CENTER] [U]What is RunePkz?[/U] This is [I][U]the[/U][/I] RunePkz goal; [IMG]http://runescape.allbyjohn.com/wp-content/uploads/2011/06/runescape02.jpg[/img]
Having a successful server, with no godswords, no dragon claws, no PvP armour, no Curses, no Korasi's and no overpowered shit.
Download link: http://dl.dropbox.com/u/35462764/RunePkz%200.1.rar Base: Project Insanity Deob: 317 Our forums: http://www.rpkz-forums.tk
Features; • Instant switching! (See .gif images below!)
Instant switching! [img]http://i1196.photobucket.com/albums/aa411/Ven0cide/Switching.gif[/img] Good old merchanting with rares. [IMG]http://i1196.photobucket.com/albums/aa411/Ven0cide/Traderares.png[/img] I made this in photoshop, and I think I made quite a good job since it was my first time using it. (The idea was that when you run the client you'll see the old school characters, and when the loginbox pops up you just see their heads :P [IMG]http://i1196.photobucket.com/albums/aa411/Ven0cide/Client-1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1196.photobucket.com/albums/aa411/Ven0cide/Client.png[/img]
I hate the way DDS hits on the nooby servers, I changed it back to it's origin! [img]http://i1196.photobucket.com/albums/aa411/Ven0cide/oldddsanim.png[/img]
I thought that moving water plays a huge part in an Oldschool PK server so I added it. (Obv, joking :P) [IMG]http://i1196.photobucket.com/albums/aa411/Ven0cide/MovingWater.gif[/img]
Here is the oldschool Abyssal Whip Attack emote. Also note the custom Healthbars. [IMG]http://i1196.photobucket.com/albums/aa411/Ven0cide/Whipemotenewhpbars.gif[/img]
Here is a a small part of the wilderness, but also one of the most important ones. You can kill Green Dragons here for Dragon bones and green d-hides, they can also drop Dragon medhelms, Ava's Accum/Attract and ancient staff and more. [IMG]http://i1196.photobucket.com/albums/aa411/Ven0cide/GreenDragons.gif[/img]
[IMG]http://i1196.photobucket.com/albums/aa411/Ven0cide/Traininthewild.gif[/img]
Implented energy system! :) [IMG]http://i1196.photobucket.com/albums/aa411/Ven0cide/Energy.gif[/img]
A little PKing + modifyed death emote + timer [IMG]http://i1196.photobucket.com/albums/aa411/Ven0cide/PKing.gif[/img]
The YouTube channel I post updates on is: http://www.youtube.com/user/ven0cide [/CENTER]

item.title: RunePkz - Oldschool PKing Server - Updated Daily - [RELEASED]
item.dc:creator: @Ven0cide Ven0cide
item.description:
@Ven0cide wrote:

RunePkz will HOPEFULLY be released tomorrow, me and my friend tried it out for ourselves and we found a bug which made him unable to log in.

After that has been fixed, XP rates has been set, Forums have been cleaned up + organized, advertising have been made, possible promotion videos are finished, RunePkz will be released.

(With all that, I mean that it won’t take longer than 1-2 days for it to be released)

Read full topic
item.source: RunePkz - Oldschool PKing Server - Updated Daily - [RELEASED]

item.title: RunePkz - Oldschool PKing Server - Updated Daily - [RELEASED]
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

[quote=“I Roll Deep, post:24, topic:414072”][quote author=F A I L S link=topic=516036.msg3744087#msg3744087 date=1315611664]

[quote]Bahaha, I agree, if or when I release mine, (of coarse with my dev team’s permission), ima try to get even closer then how I Roll Deep got [/quote] Good luck with this, it’s a shame I Roll Deep, did not completely Finish it.
[/quote]
Is this about RuneFocus or xEpicz?

  1. I always was solo in coding, never was in a team.
  2. I’m still working on my projects.

[quote author=judostar1 link=topic=516036.msg3744925#msg3744925 date=1315672386]

moving water looks so retarded why would you add that even if you were joking

Also, if its a pking server why are you showing media of everything except pking, you should add pictures on your combat features
[/quote]True, Also before you get my support, your going to have to add something iv’e never seen before, this is all to familiar.

You mean like me and I Roll Deep coding a source that almost no1 uses.

iClarity is going to be used by people who have someone who know what’s doing[/quote]

Yeah, but right now it seems like only you and me are…

Read full topic
item.source: RunePkz - Oldschool PKing Server - Updated Daily - [RELEASED]

Also, if its a pking server why are you showing media of everything except pking, you should add pictures on your combat features

item.description:
@F_A_I_L_S wrote:

Well when and if you release yours, I’m sure people will use it. Also yes something like that, I don’t care what it is, Allstar/PI/Delta/Project-Annihilation/Dodian. I don’t care. If it’s something i have never seen before done on an RsPs you will have my full support. More people need to think outside the box. Some coders can do it, but yet they don’t.

item.title: RunePkz - Oldschool PKing Server - Updated Daily - [RELEASED]
item.dc:creator: @judostar1 judostar1
item.description:
@judostar1 wrote:

F A I L S:

Iv’e seen this somewhere before, Can’t place my finger on it. Also it’s due to release on the 14th? Well my personal opinion (Don’t got to agree with it, or like it) is you need to spend more time, not hurry up, rush, and Release this. Make it good, add things that the moparscape community has never seen in a server. Think outside the box.

Bahaha, I agree, if or when I release mine, (of coarse with my dev team’s permission), ima try to get even closer then how I Roll Deep got
